Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
IGameBoard contract GameBoard represents the board for extendedConnect X

      checkIfFreeContract Returns true if column contains free space
      Parameters:
      c - indicates column number to check
      Returns:
      [boolean, true IFF column contains ' ', false otherwise]

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      checkForWinContract Checks to see if there are 5 tokens in a row, up, or diagonal
      Parameters:
      c - indicates column number to check.
      Returns:
      [returns true iff 5 of the same players tokens are placed in a consecutive horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row. False iff 5 tokens are not consecutively placed.]

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      checkTieContract Check to see if the game has ended in a tie
      Returns:
      [true iff all positions on GameBoard are full return false if GameBoard is not full]

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checkHorizWinContract Check if either player has num_to_win tokens connected horizontally
      Parameters:
      pos - Indicates current position on the board
      p - Indicates the player's character
      Returns:
      [Boolean, returns true iff player has horizontal win, false iff they do not have horizontal win.]

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checkVertWinContract Check if either player has num_to_win tokens connected vertically
      Parameters:
      pos - Indicates the position on the gameBoard
      p - Indicates the player's character
      Returns:
      [Boolean, returns true iff player wins at vertical position, false iff player does not win at vertical position.]

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      Check if either player has num_to_win tokens connected diagonally
      Parameters:
      pos - Indicates position on gameBoard
      p - Indicates the player's character
      Returns:
      [Boolean, returns true iff player wins at diagonal position and false iff player does not win at vertical position.]

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      isPlayerAtPosContract Determine which player has placed a token at the position on the Gameboard
      Parameters:
      pos - Indicates current position on the GameBoard
      player - character of the player [X or O]
      Returns:
      [boolean, true iff correct player token is at position false iff other player is at position]
